name: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
title: Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds
desc: The gale gallops through the woods.

skills.desc: Switch to the target character and creates 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Omni Element.(You must have at least 2 <span style="color:#80FFD7FF">Anemo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
